title: Hajimari no Joshi Kouishitsu
description:
Mio and the Class President are alone in the changing room and find out that they have a thing in common... and then they start finding more [i]interesting[/i] things in the mean time...

Artist's twitter: [url]https://twitter.com/mashumaro_00[/url]
